titleStmt.title: The kings favour, the Parliaments iustice, and the subiects ioy. Expressed in His Maiesties care for the kingdome. The Parliaments for endeavouring. And the Commons sedulity in propagating the same. Written and avowed by Richard Newrobe, gent.
titleStmt.author: Newrobe, Richard.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
